Package src.cineplex

Class Screenings

Object
Screenings
public class Screenings extends Object
Represents all screening timing for a movie under a cineplex
Since:
2022-11-13
Version:
3.1
Author:
Tan Jun Hong

  • Constructor Details

    • Screenings

      public Screenings(String MovieName, String cineplex) throws Exception
      Creates a screening of a movie in the cineplex
      Parameters:
      MovieName - name of movie that has all its screening here as a String
      cineplex - cineplex name that this screening list is under
      Throws:
      Exception

  • Method Details

    • AddTiming

      void AddTiming(Date date)
      add timing into the list of timings
      Parameters:
      date - Date and time of screening to add.

    • removeTiming

      void removeTiming(Date date)
      remove the timing of the screening from the list by date
      Parameters:
      date - date and time of the Screening to be removed passed in as a Date object.

    • removeTiming

      void removeTiming(int index)
      overloaded function to remove the timing of the screening from the list by index
      Parameters:
      index - index of the list to remove the screening from the arraylisy passed in as an int

    • listTiming

      int listTiming()
      print the timing of everything inside the list in new lines and get the listing count
      Returns:
      the number of screenings for the movie under this cineplex as an int

    • showScreening

      public Date showScreening(int index)
      get the date and timing of the screening in the list by index
      Parameters:
      index - index in the array list by int
      Returns:
      the date and time at that index in the screening as a Date object

    • listTimingByLine

      void listTimingByLine()
      print the timing of everything inside the list in a single line

    • update

      void update(Date prevDate, Date newDate)
      update the screening in the list by finding its prev date and time and replacing it with a new one
      Parameters:
      prevDate - date and time of previous screening in a Date object
      newDate - date and time of new screeening in a Date object
